metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7868 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU) for C/C++ before 2017-02-13 hasan out-of-bounds write caused by a heap-based buffer overflow related tothe utf8TextAccess function in common/utext.cpp and the utext_moveIndex32*function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu52 - 52.1-3ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.1-3ubuntu0.6').
